channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This strategist is predicting a big rally after the Fed decision. Heâ€™s been more right than wrong this year.
item.description: Thomas Lee, the usually optimistic co-founder and head of research at Fundstrat Global Advisor, is expecting a small-cap-led rally.

item.title: Why orange juice is so expensive
item.description: Orange juice futures are hitting records as growers lose millions of dollars annually. U.S. citrus production is plummeting amid weather and disease extremes.

item.title: Stock futures rise as Wall Street awaits Fed decision: Live updates
item.description: Stock futures rose Wednesday as investors parsed the latest earnings reports and readied for the Federal Reserve monetary policy decision.

item.title: A surprise Fed rate cut might be good for consumers â€” but not for the stock market
item.description: Investors are clamoring for affirmation the Fed will begin cutting rates in September. But a surprise easing on Wednesday likely wouldnâ€™t go over well.

item.title: Ford reveals 2025 Maverick pickup with new technologies, hybrid options
item.description: Ford Motor has redesigned its small Maverick pickup truck, adding more technology, new performance and hybrid options to the vehicle.

item.title: Euro zone inflation rises to 2.6% in July, above expectations
item.description: Headline inflation in the euro zone unexpectedly rose to 2.6% in July, the European Union's statistics agency said Wednesday.

item.title: Microsoft and AMD earnings show that AI remains a game of optics
item.description: The dichotomy in Wall Streetâ€™s reactions to the results from Microsoft Corp. and Advanced Micro Devices Inc. â€” two tech giants that have been investing heavily in AI â€” is a perfect example of the AI optics game.

item.title: Trump to speak at Black journalists convention, as Harris erases his lead in polls
item.description: The event gives former President Donald Trump an opportunity to directly appeal to voters of color as he campaigns against Vice President Kamala Harris.

item.title: AMD jumps 9% in premarket trading as global chip stocks rally after earnings and geopolitics lift sector
item.description: Shares of global semiconductor firms were boosted by some positive tech earnings and a report of potentially less severe U.S. export restrictions on China.

item.title: Apple earnings will be all about this one clue
item.description: Appleâ€™s June-quarter earnings report isnâ€™t typically one to write home about, but thereâ€™s still value to it.

item.title: Harris directly challenges Trump to debate: 'Say it to my face'
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris goaded Donald Trump at a rally in Atlanta before a roaring crowd of more than 10,000 supporters.

item.title: Iran says Israel will 'pay heavy price' after death of top Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh
item.description: Iranian supreme leader Ayatollah Khamenei said in a statement that Israel "has prepared the ground for severe punishment with this action."

item.title: Intel earnings: Can the company cut its way to an improved position?
item.description: Intel is expected to post a decline in adjusted profit when it reports earnings Thursday, and job cuts reportedly are on the horizon.

item.title: Trump address to Black journalist convention prompts co-chair Karen Attiah to quit
item.description: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump is set to address the National Association of Black Journalists convention in Chicago on Wednesday.

item.title: Bank of England rate cut is a close call even with inflation on target
item.description: Members of the central bank's voting Monetary Policy Committee are divided.
